home.whyChooseUsDesc: We are committed to delivering excellence in every package
home.feature1Desc: High-quality materials and precise manufacturing standards
home.feature2Desc: Free packaging design service tailored to your brand
home.feature3Desc: Quick turnaround time with reliable delivery
home.feature4Desc: Professional consultation from our experienced team
home.ourProductsDesc: Explore our wide range of packaging solutions
home.ourClientsDesc: Over 10,000 brands trust us with their packaging needs
home.ctaDesc: Contact us today for a free consultation and quote
home.articlesDesc: Learn more about packaging and industry trends
home.minOrderDesc: Packpert Co., Ltd. is a leader in One Stop Packaging Solutions, committed to being a partner that helps create competitive advantages for your business through professional packaging management.
home.minOrderDesc2: We provide services from expert packaging consultation, attractive packaging design by our diverse creative team, to fast packaging production and delivery – the key elements that help customers reduce operational time and packaging costs most efficiently. We use modern, high-quality packaging production technology to ensure every printed and formed piece is beautiful, sharp, and enhances your brand image to stand out in the market. Packpert understands the needs of entrepreneurs across all industries, so we develop services that meet both aesthetic and functional packaging requirements.
home.minOrderDesc3: If you're looking for a packaging factory that understands every step and is ready to elevate your product image with world-class design, Packpert is ready to deliver the best solutions for your brand's sustainable success.

about.title: Elevate Your Brand
about.subtitle: Packpert Co., Ltd. is a leader in One Stop Packaging Solutions, committed to being a partner that helps create competitive advantages for your business through professional packaging management.
about.description: We provide services from expert packaging consultation, attractive packaging design by our diverse creative team, to fast packaging production and delivery – the key elements that help customers reduce operational time and packaging costs most efficiently. We use modern, high-quality packaging production technology to ensure every printed and formed piece is beautiful, sharp, and enhances your brand image to stand out in the market. Packpert understands the needs of entrepreneurs across all industries, so we develop services that meet both aesthetic and functional packaging requirements.
about.description2: If you're looking for a packaging factory that understands every step and is ready to elevate your product image with world-class design, Packpert is ready to deliver the best solutions for your brand's sustainable success.
about.missionDesc: To provide innovative and sustainable packaging solutions that help brands stand out while maintaining the highest quality standards.
about.visionDesc: To become the most trusted packaging partner in Southeast Asia, known for quality, innovation, and customer satisfaction.
about.oneStopDesc: From consultation to delivery, we handle everything for your packaging needs
about.step1Desc: Discuss your requirements with our expert team
about.step2Desc: Free custom design tailored to your brand
about.step3Desc: High-quality manufacturing with strict quality control
about.step4Desc: Fast and reliable delivery to your location
about.bannerSubtitle: One-stop service from design, production, to delivery
about.service1Desc: Expert consultation and recommendations for packaging that suits your brand
about.service2Desc: Complete one-stop service from material selection to delivery. Fast, reliable quality, meeting all your business needs
about.service3Desc: Transform your ideas into outstanding designs. Create a unique identity that makes your brand memorable

catalog.title: Product Catalog
catalog.subtitle: Explore Our Packaging Solutions
catalog.creamTubeH1: Complete Cream Tube Solutions with Innovative All-in-One Packaging
catalog.creamTubeSubheadline: Elevate your brand with 2026 skincare tube designs. Choose from over 100 styles with specialty applicators including roller balls, silicone brushes, and droppers to suit every product texture.
catalog.stickTubeH1: Multi-Stick Packaging Innovation for Sunscreen and Blush Products
catalog.stickTubeSubheadline: Stay ahead of 2026 beauty trends with stick-format packaging. Easy to use, mess-free application perfect for sunscreen sticks, nourishing balms, and all types of makeup sticks.
catalog.pumpBottleH1: Elevate Your Brand with Modern Plastic Bottle Designs Combining Beauty and Versatility
catalog.pumpBottleSubheadline: Curated selection of premium pump bottles that preserve extracts and maintain cream efficacy. Features airless vacuum systems and luxurious PET bottles in multiple sizes.
catalog.jarH1: Complete Collection of Cream Jars with Designs for Every Product Category
catalog.jarSubheadline: Your source for skincare jars from 15g to 250g, plus innovative toner pad jars with built-in cotton pickers. Maintain cleanliness and build brand credibility.
catalog.serumBottleH1: Premium Serum & Dropper Bottle Collection with Superior Designs and Unmatched Variety
catalog.serumBottleSubheadline: Glass and plastic bottles for concentrated serums with precision-controlled droppers and UV protection properties for optimal product quality.
catalog.lipH1: Lipstick & Lip Gloss Packaging with Modern Designs to Enhance Your Makeup Brand
catalog.lipSubheadline: Premium twist-up lipstick tubes and trending 2026 lip gloss dip tubes with innovative brush applicators for smooth, counter-brand quality application.
catalog.cosmeticsH1: Cushion Compacts & Powder Cases with Elegant Designs Driving Makeup Trends
catalog.cosmeticsSubheadline: Elevate your makeup line with portable compacts featuring secure locks to prevent product drying, built-in mirrors, and separate puff compartments for optimal hygiene.
catalog.stickTubeAlt: Colorful roll-on and deodorant stick packaging (orange, green, blue, white) arranged on black circular platform against dark green brick wall backdrop
catalog.pumpBottleAlt: White skincare packaging and brown glass bottles arranged in rows on factory conveyor belt, showcasing the product filling process
catalog.creamTubeAlt: Collection of pure white cream tubes in various sizes and round bottles displayed on product showcase platform, perfect for skincare product mockups
catalog.jarAlt: Round cream jars in dark green, yellow, and pink on circular platform, with yellow jar opened to show inner texture
catalog.lipAlt: Luxurious lipstick and lip gloss packaging in various designs including black, silver, and pink tubes displayed on studio platform
catalog.cosmeticsAlt: Square and round cushion compacts and powder cases in purple, blue, and black-gold displayed with lids open showing mirrors and puffs inside
catalog.serumBottleAlt: Premium gold dropper and pump serum glass bottles displayed on polished concrete surface with blue neon light backdrop

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.introContent: Packpert Co., Ltd. ("Company", "we", "us") values your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and protect your personal information when you use our website services, in compliance with Thailand's Personal Data Protection Act B.E. 2562 (PDPA).
privacy.section1Content: We may collect the following types of personal information:
privacy.section1List1: Personal Information: Name, address, phone number, email address
privacy.section1List2: Company Information: Company name, job title, business type
privacy.section1List3: Contact Information: Inquiry history, messages sent through forms
privacy.section1List4: Technical Information: IP address, browser type, website visit data
privacy.section2Content: We use your personal information for the following purposes:
privacy.section2List1: To respond to inquiries and provide requested services
privacy.section2List2: To prepare quotations and process orders
privacy.section2List3: To send news, promotions, and marketing activities (with your consent)
privacy.section2List4: To improve and develop our services
privacy.section3Content: We will not disclose your personal information to third parties except in the following cases:
privacy.section3List2: To comply with court orders or government agencies
privacy.section3List3: To prevent harm to life, body, or property
privacy.section3List4: Disclosure to service providers we engage, such as delivery services, payment services
privacy.section4Content: We implement appropriate technical and administrative security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, use, modification, or disclosure, including data encryption (SSL) and access control restrictions.
privacy.section5Content: Our website uses cookies and similar technologies to improve user experience, analyze website traffic, and display relevant content. You can configure your browser to reject cookies, but this may affect some functionality of the website.
privacy.section6Content: You have rights under Thailand's Personal Data Protection Act B.E. 2562 (PDPA) as follows:
privacy.section6List1: Right to access and obtain a copy of your personal data
privacy.section6List2: Right to rectify your personal data to be accurate
privacy.section6List3: Right to erasure or destruction of personal data
privacy.section6List4: Right to restrict the processing of personal data
privacy.section6List5: Right to object to data processing
privacy.section7Content: We will retain your personal information for as long as necessary for the purposes stated in this policy or as required by law. Generally, we will retain data for no longer than 5 years from the date of last contact, unless there is a legal requirement to retain it longer.
privacy.section8Content: We reserve the right to modify or update this Privacy Policy at any time. Any changes will take effect immediately upon publication on our website. We recommend that you review this policy regularly.
privacy.contactContent: If you have any questions, concerns, or wish to exercise your rights regarding your personal information, please contact us at:

agent.title: Packpert Agent Program
agent.whyChooseTitle: Why Choose to Be a Packpert Agent
agent.feature1Desc: No need to invest in inventory yourself. Reduce your business startup risk by 100%
agent.feature2Desc: Rewarding returns from your first order. Maximize your profits based on sales volume
agent.feature3Desc: We handle packing and shipping on your behalf. Convenient and hassle-free, no packing required

agent.step2: Get sales materials. Download premium product images and catalogs to sell immediately
agent.step3: Submit orders through the system and receive your profit margin
agent.ctaTitle: Ready to Start Earning with Packpert?
